dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4289 IH: To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to repeal certain disclosure requirements related to coal and mine safety.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mooney of West Virginia (for himself and Mr. Barr) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to repeal certain disclosure requirements related to coal and mine safety.

section.header: Repeal of coal and mine safety disclosure requirements

subsection.text: Section 1503 of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (15 U.S.C. 78mâ€“2) is hereby repealed.
The table of contents in section 1(b) of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (12 U.S.C. 5301 et seq.) is amended by striking the item relating to section 1503.
